Objectives post-market registry : Primary : To prevent risk rupture death treatment common iliac aneurysm iliac branch stent graft ( E-liac , JOTEC ) Secondary : Evaluation safety feasibility E-liac Stent Graft System use endovascular treatment uni- bilateral aorto-iliac iliac aneurysm .
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Multicenter Study Endovascular Treatment Iliac Aneurysm With Branched E-liac Stent Graft
DOC.criteria: Unilateral bilateral aortoiliac iliac aneurysm Suitable endovascular repair Patient must compliant life long followup investigation > 18 year old lliac/femoral access vessel morphology compatible implantation procedure 18Fr ( 6mm OD ) delivery system Nonaneurysmal common iliac artery land area case iliac artery aneurysm ≥ 20mm Diameter common iliac artery proximal land area : 12mm 17mm Nonaneurysmal external iliac artery segment distal aneurysm ≥15mm Diameter external iliac artery distal landing area : 8mm 13mm Nonaneurysmal internal iliac artery segment distal aneurysm ≥15mm Angle external iliac artery internal iliac artery ≤50° Thrombus free iliac lumen area iliac bifurcation open hypogastric side branch implant cover stent ≥18mm Sufficiently open internal iliac arterv ostium Patients must comply instruction use . Patients common iliac aneurysm diameter ≥30mm isolate common iliac aneurysm diameter > 25mm associated abdominal aortic aneurysm Unilateral bilateral common iliac aneurysm Patient 's anatomy must fit stent graft placement preoperative angio CT scan . Patient affiliate social security equivalent system . The patient must available appropriate followup time duration study . Patient inform nature study , agree provision sign informed consent .
